name: @IT(atmarkit.co.jp) article width adjuster
description:
@ITの固定幅となっている記事を調整できるようにします。
This script enables the article of @IT(atmarkit.co.jp) whose width is fixed to be adjustable accordingly to the browser width.
additional_info:
Tested browser: Firefox 68.5esr + Stylish
Update 20180623: add #masterBody property
Update 20200224: fix #masterBody to enable "print" option
Update 20200304: Fix top page glitches
